mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS songId, s.name AS songName, s.album AS album, s.lyric AS lyric, s.duration AS duration, s.cover_url AS songCoverUrl, s.audio_url AS audioUrl, s.release_time AS releaseTime, a.name AS artistName, c.id AS commentId, c.content AS content, c.create_time AS createTime, c.like_count AS likeCount, u.username AS username, u.user_avatar AS userAvatar FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id # 左连接 , 即使 s.artist_id 为 null 或者 tb_artist 没对应记录，歌曲照样查出来, 只是 artistName 为 null。 LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON s.id = c.song_id AND c.type = 0 # 没评论也不会被过滤掉，不会影响歌曲本身的查询 LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.id # 即便用户被删、找不到，评论也不会被过滤掉，只是用户信息为 null WHERE s.id = #{songId}

SELECT s.id AS songId, s.name AS songName, s.album, s.duration, s.cover_url AS coverUrl, s.audio_url AS audioUrl, s.release_time AS releaseTime, a.name AS artistName FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN tb_user_favorite u ON s.id = u.song_id WHERE
s.id IN
#{id}
AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%')
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{artistName}, '%')
AND s.album LIKE CONCAT('%', #{album}, '%')
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
